21.heading: Min, Grace.
21.title: Love or Money. v. 1
21.author: by Sang-Eun Lee ; translation, Grace Min.
21.genre: Teen humor and rich kid genres.
notes: "First published in 2001 by Daiwon C.I. Inc."
Summary: "Yenni is a cute and feisty 15-year-old ... and totally obsessed with getting rich! She runs a very profitable business

too bad it's loan-sharking at school. Her wealthy grandmother is so shocked that she decides to hit Yenni where it really hurts: in the pocketbook! If Yenni doesn't stop her money-grubbing ways and marry an honest boy, she'll be written out of Grandma's will. Can Yenni get her act together and take the ultimate payoff?"

45.heading: Minahan, John.
45.title: Nunzio : a Novel
45.author: by John Minahan ; based on a screenplay by James Andronica.
notes: Summary: "To the toughs on the street, he's a clown. To his family, he's a beloved child in a strong man's body. To Michele, the beautiful bakery girl, he's a gentle and heartbreaking suitor. But Nunzio will tell you he is none other than the mighty Man of Steel, super-powered champion of Brooklyn. And, in between grocery deliveries, he will show you just what he means."
Genre: Superhero fiction.
